text: The Inbetweeners is a British coming-of-age sitcom. Most of it was filmed in Abbots Langley and Ruislip, London. It has three seasons, originally airing on E4 from 2008 to 2010. It also has two feature films, with the first one releasing in 2011 and the other in 2014. == Cast == * Simon Bird as Will McKenzie * Joe Thomas as Simon Cooper * Blake Harrison as Neil Sutherland * James Buckley as Jay Cartwright Category:British sitcoms
title: The Inbetweeners
